actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works.

official_title: A bill to amend title II of the Water Pollution Control Act Amendments of 1972 (Public Law 92-500).

summary.text: Provides that any water treatment project in which construction was initiated after July 1, 1972, and which did not receive Federal grant support shall be eligible for future reimbursement to the same extent that a grant support could have been provided if all funds authorized under the Water Pollution Control Act Amendments of 1972 had been appropriated and alloted to the States in accordance with that Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend title II of the Water Pollution Control Act Amendments of 1972 (Public Law 92-500).
